articles.title: Thousands across Australia demonstrate in solidarity with US after abortion access ruling - ABC News
articles.description: In the wake of the Roe v Wade ruling in the US being overturned, protesters in cities across Australia say they will fight any attempts to wind back reproductive rights.
articles.content:
Thousands have rallied across Australia in a show of solidarity with abortion rights protesters in the US following the overturning of Roe v Wade.
As well as responding to the limiting of abortion a… [+3973 chars]

articles.title: Western Australia's single-use plastic ban comes into effect - Sky News Australia
articles.description: Western Australia’s single-use plastics ban comes into effect today.Prohibited items include thick plastic bags, and polystyrene food containers.
